Gangon happily smiled at BrightBlade.

"That's great, BrightBlade! is it okay to still hang around you,
sub-commander?" Gangon said. Lightmare harumphed...

Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 9:21 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::: Hell Beast watches them fly off, now he stands with Megatron, Marine,
> Black Aracnia, Bright Blade, and Gangon. :::
>
> ::: Hell Beast snaps his neck towrds Brightblade ::: Brightblade, seeeing
as
> how you are one of my more loyal bots, and reliable, Im making you into my
> new Sub-Commander. I need a person who will be around more, a person who's
> not afraid to fight, and a bot who can think.
>
> ::: Marine growls under his breath, as Megatron laughs. ::: A fembot?!
That
> is quite pathetic!
>
> ::: Hell Beast ::: If you hadnt lost in the first place we wouldnt even be
